page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: { {King's Square}and Castle Street both have imposing Georgian houses. {Market Street}and Mount Street have terraced Victorian houses in good repair {Angel Crescent}has Georgian houses now being restored for use as offices and flats. {Newtown,}built in the 1930's has streets of brick built terraced houses with long gardens. Originally council built and owned now many are privately owned. Many of the houses built around the town centre have red bricks and tiles which were manufactured in Bridgwater before the closure of the brickyards in the early 1960's.
